text: (vah vaaqiya bhee yaad karo) jab farishton ne (mariyam) se kaha ai mariyam khuda tumako sirf apane hukm se ek ladake ke paida hone kee khushakhabaree deta hai jisaka naam eesa maseeh ibne mariyam hoga (aur) duniya aur aakherat (donon) mein baijzat (aabaroo) aur khuda ke muqarrab bandon mein hoga
